CustomField.formula: IF( Route__r.Opportunity_Enquiry__r.RecordType.Name == 'Air Freight', 'Total CBM Weight :'& Text( Route__r.Total_CBM__c ) &' Total Gross Weight:'& Text( Route__r.Total_Gross_Weight_KGs__c ) &' Total Volumetric Weight : '& Text( Route__r.Total_Volumetric_Weight__c ), 'CBM : '& Text(CBM__c) &' | Weight : '& Text(Weight_Kgs__c) &' | Units : '&Text(Units__c))
CustomField.label: Tab View
